title: Immersive VR Headset
summary: A sleek VR headset with a curved visor and adjustable strap, engineered for enhanced user immersion and comfort.
description: Developed an immersive VR headset with a focus on ergonomic design and aesthetic appeal. Utilizing SolidWorks for surface modeling, the curved visor and adjustable strap were crafted to ensure a snug fit and optimal viewing experience, suitable for extended virtual reality sessions.

title: Handheld Precision Tool
summary: A robust handheld tool featuring a cylindrical barrel, ergonomic grip, and trigger mechanism, optimized for precision industrial tasks.
description: Designed a handheld precision tool with a focus on ergonomic handling and durability. The cylindrical barrel and trigger assembly were engineered using SolidWorks to ensure seamless integration and functionality, making it ideal for industrial applications requiring accuracy and comfort.

title: Luxury Perfume Bottle
summary: An elegant perfume bottle with a distinctive black cap, designed to elevate brand prestige.
description: Created a luxury perfume bottle with a unique black cap to enhance its premium appeal. Using SolidWorks, the design emphasizes smooth curves and precise tolerances, making it an ideal candidate for high-end cosmetic packaging and manufacturing.

title: Pleated Pot
summary: A conical pot with a pleated texture, designed as a stylish and functional container solution.
description: Designed a pleated pot with a conical structure to combine aesthetic appeal with practical utility. Crafted in SolidWorks, the pleated texture was meticulously modeled to ensure structural integrity and ease of fabrication, suitable for decorative or functional use in various settings.

title: Raspberry Pi Camera Enclosure
summary: A larger enclosure with a circular opening, designed to protect and mount a Raspberry Pi camera.
description: Developed a larger enclosure for a Raspberry Pi camera, incorporating a circular opening for the lens and multiple port slots. Designed in SolidWorks with a focus on durability and ease of assembly, this enclosure is perfect for outdoor or industrial camera applications.

title: Raspberry Pi Display Enclosure
summary: A compact enclosure with port cutouts, custom-built to house a Raspberry Pi display screen securely.
description: Engineered a compact enclosure for a Raspberry Pi display screen, featuring precise cutouts for ports and a robust design. Using SolidWorks, the enclosure was optimized for ventilation and accessibility, ensuring reliable performance for DIY electronics projects.

title: Ventilated Server Rack
summary: A tall server rack with ventilated sides and a top vent, designed for optimal cooling and accessibility.
description: Created a ventilated server rack with side panels and a top vent to ensure efficient airflow and equipment accessibility. Using SolidWorks, the design was refined to meet industrial standards for data center environments, enhancing thermal management and structural stability.

title: Adjustable Mounting Tray
summary: A flat tray with a circular cutout and adjustable arm, designed for versatile mounting solutions.
description: Designed an adjustable mounting tray with a circular cutout and a flexible arm for customizable positioning. Engineered in SolidWorks, this tray offers a practical solution for holding devices or tools, with a focus on durability and ease of adjustment for various applications.

title: Fantasy Football Championship Trophy
summary: A striking trophy with a football topper, engraved with a motivational quote and championship details.
description: Designed a Fantasy Football Championship Trophy featuring a golden football topper and an engraved base with Vince Lombardi's iconic quote. Crafted in SolidWorks and rendered for a premium finish, this trophy symbolizes victory and pride for the 2025 league season.
